mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cartno, optionlan, optionqual, optionrent, optionprice, memberno, filmno) VALUES (cart_seq.nextval, #{optionlan, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionqual}, #{optionrent}, #{optionprice}, #{memberno}, #{filmno})
mapper.select: SELECT cartno, optionlan, optionqual, optionrent, optionprice, memberno, filmno FROM cart WHERE memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY cartno DESC

SELECT f.titlekr, f.titleen, f.filmno, c.optionlan, c.optionqual, c.optionprice, c.cartno, c.optionrent FROM film f, cart c WHERE f.filmno = c.filmno AND c.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY c.cartno DESC
SELECT f.titlekr, f.titleen, f.filmno, c.optionlan, c.optionqual, c.optionprice, c.cartno, c.optionrent FROM film f, cart c WHERE f.filmno = c.filmno AND c.cartno = #{cartno}
